item.description:
Hey guys and gals! We are going out to Hartford for Friday night. I've gotten the good word there's a block party along with my friend Teresa who is having her birthday party! Let's plan to meet up there for 10:00p.m.

Bring a positive vibe and some friends along with you if you desire because the more the merrier! The reviews were good and people rated it as the number one place to be for this event in Hartford. Let's check it out and have some fun! If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions you can email Ace or email/call me at 860-919-9782. Can't wait for this one it should be a good turnout we have many friends going!
item.how_to_find_us: Email Ace or myself. You can also just look for us there and if you have trouble call me at 860-919-9782.
item.name: Block Party in Hartford!
